channel.title: Real-World Deployments on A²R Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Real-World Deployments on A²R Lab

item.title: Mind the Gap: Opportunities and Challenges in the Transition Between Research and Industry
item.description: Mind the Gap: Opportunities and Challenges in the Transition Between Research and Industry is aimed at bridging the gap between academia and industry. For researchers, this workshop will help lift the curtain on the realities of academic to industry tech transfer. For industry experts, this workshop provides an opportunity to influence the direction of academic research. For both, we hope to provide an venue for integrated dialogue and identification of new potential collaborations.
